bibliographic-data.invention-title: MOBILE DEVICE SECURITY USING WEARABLE SECURITY TOKENS

nplcit.text: Smart Card Handbook, 2nd Edition. Rankl, Wolfgang and Effing, Wolfgang. Wiley Publishers, 2000. Chapters 1, 2, 4, 8, 12-14, front and back matter included

abstract.p: The claimed subject matter provides systems and/or methods that effectuates and establishes mobile device security. The system can include devices that detect point of sale mechanisms or secure token devices and based at least in part on the detection of secure token devices the system effectuates release of electronic funds persisted on a mobile device in order to satisfy a debt accrued at the point of sale mechanism.

MOBILGERÄTESICHERHEIT UNTER VERWENDUNG VON TRAGBAREN SICHERHEITS-TOKEN

MOBILE DEVICE SECURITY USING WEARABLE SECURITY TOKENS
SÉCURITÉ DE DISPOSITIF MOBILE UTILISANT DES JETONS DE SÉCURITÉ PORTABLES

abstract.p: The claimed subject matter provides systems and/or methods that effectuates and establishes mobile device security. The system can include devices that detect point of sale mechanisms or secure token devices and based at least in part on the detection of secure token devices the system effectuates release of electronic funds persisted on a mobile device in order to satisfy a debt accrued at the point of sale mechanism.

La présente invention porte sur des systèmes et/ou des procédés qui effectuent et établissent une sécurité de dispositif mobile. Le système peut comprendre des dispositifs qui détectent des mécanismes de point de vente ou des dispositifs de jeton sécurisés et, au moins en partie selon la détection de dispositifs de jeton sécurisés, le système effectue un déblocage de fond électronique persistant sur un dispositif mobile afin de satisfaire une dette cumulée au niveau du mécanisme de point de vente.
